This black _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38)_ reflects light only along its edge, like a thin crescent moon. It grants a +1 item bonus to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) while you're holding it, increasing to a +2 item bonus if it has a [_+3 weapon potency rune_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=281).
